package password;
import java.util.*;

public class generate_strong_password {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		Scanner sc= new Scanner(System.in);
		System.out.println("enter the 4 digit value");
		int value_1=sc.nextInt();
		int value_2=sc.nextInt();
		int value_3=sc.nextInt();
		int value_4=sc.nextInt();
		System.out.println("you have generated code suceessfully");
		System.out.println(value_1+" "+value_2+" "+value_3+" "+value_4);
		
		

	}

}
